reporter_caption.center: POE v. HAWAI`I LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, 24476 (Haw. 11-14-2002)

caption.center: LEWIS W. POE, Petitioner-Appellant-Respondent, v. HAWAI`I LABOR RELATIONS

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIV. NO. 00-1-3610)
opinion.attorneys: Valri Lei Kunimoto for respondent-appellee-petitioner on the writ

center.italic: ORDER DENYING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
LEVINSON, J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Ramil, and Acoba, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Upon consideration of the application for a writ of certiorari filed on November 4, 2002, by the respondent-appellee-petitioner Hawai`i Labor Relations Board, the same is hereby denied.
